attributes.action: Children football referees to be impartial at all games or be held accounted for
attributes.additional_details: Please support this cause for the children who enjoy the game and want to continue to do so and not get disheartened by an unfair referee who has clearly taken sides before kick off
attributes.background: Children always enjoy a good football match but every so often they play where the match is unfairly reffed. May these people be held accountable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
